plot: Three strangers die and find themselves in an unexpected afterlife- a waiting room. Is it purgatory or Hell? What connection do they have to one another? And what is it, if anything, that they're waiting for?
title: The Waiting Game
plot_es: Three strangers die and find themselves in an unexpected afterlife- a waiting room. Is it purgatory or Hell? What connection do they have to one another? And what is it, if anything, that they're waiting for?
plot_en: Three strangers die and find themselves in an unexpected afterlife- a waiting room. Is it purgatory or Hell? What connection do they have to one another? And what is it, if anything, that they're waiting for?
